about.big:
Post Neon is a  new Creative Studio based in Amsterdam. The studio creates digital experiences, physical installations, videos and 3D content. They explore alternate realities, physical and non-physical space.

They have worked with institutions such as STRP, MU Artspace, Cinekid, TUE Innovation Space and brands such as Iris van Herpen, TopNotch and Adidas. Dezeen mentioned one of their projects as best graduation projects of 2018 and WGSN(Insider) featured their work in the report that unpacks the ten most influential concepts for 2019.

In our series Symbiosis, we explored the reevaluated belief in nature by returning to the roots of our existence; the fungal network.

We envisioned an ‚Äòalternative reality‚Äô in which nature and technology co-exist in harmony, nourishing each other in a sacred balancing act. As godly figures flourish out of the surrealistic landscape, we can question ourselves: Could technology and nature ever exist in a state of symbiosis?

The Age of Collectivity is a virtual scene which displays a gathering of characters coming from different views, backgrounds, and beliefs who put their differences aside to be part of the collective spirit. By celebrating the similarities instead of their differences, the characters act in unity. The viewer is encouraged to consciously think about the current state of affairs and the collective mindset which The Age of Collectivity is conveying. 

The visitors of STRP are invited to participate and interact with the online artwork to join the festive ritual. They will be able to influence the visual composition and switch between various camera positions within the environment by typing in different key commands. The visual narrative is accompanied by a unique sonic experience formed by various international artists curated by Pim Boreel. 

Post Neon envisions a post-pandemic era where people develop a shared mindset and communal spirit that can be experienced during nightlife. Post Neon, is a new Amsterdam based creative studio that is known for surrealistic, autonomic work with a focus on scale, material and texture in 3D content creation and creative technologies.
